remarks: Binary relation expressing ` <. A , B >. ` is a modular pair. Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdbr $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A MH B <-> A. x e. CH ( x C_ B -> ( ( x vH A ) i^i B ) = ( x vH ( A i^i B ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
